April 14, 1967
JOINT COMMITTEE ON
NAVAJO-HOPI INDIAN
ADMINISTRATION
Mrs* Marjorie Newman
Program Director, WFSU-FM
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida 32306
Dear Mrs. Newman:
Thank you for your letter of April 7th regarding the
pending legislation to provide aid to educational
TV and educational radio broadcasting.
You have recommended support for the full inclusion
of radio in all titles of the proposed legislation.
I am very glad to have your views on this issue and
your recommendations will certainly be kept before
me when the bills come to the House for consideration.
With go<
